body:
Use this service to find out:
* what is the most suitable way for you to agree child arrangements
* if going to court is right for you

components.html: Youâ€™ll be asked general questions about your relationship with the other parent and previous attempts to agree child arrangements with them.
You're completely anonymous while using this service and no one will ever see your answers.

heading: Check your options for child arrangements
lede: Child arrangements is also known as contact, access or custody. For example, you may need to decide where your children will live or rearrange the times they see you.
